title: The Falling from the Condo Case

infobox.Title:: The Falling from the Condo Case
infobox.Japanese title:: マンション転落事件  (Manshon Tenraku Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Kazunobu Chiba  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka and Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi, Next Conan's Hint  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Toshiyuki Morikawa as Joji Ueda  Takashi Onozuka as Mitsuo Yoshimura  Yasuo Muramatsu as Ryoji Hara  Shinichiro Miki as Umemoto  Mie Akagi as Waitress

sections.Situation: Kogoro accepts a case to help to find out who has been sending threatening phone calls and letters. On the way to the man's apartment with his friend, Kogoro and Conan witness the man fall to his death.

- 29 years old

- Tokyo medical school doctor
